description: Document obtained by German newspaper outlines scenario where Moscow could attack Nato territory next year
maintext: Russia could use these clashes as a pretext to deploy up to 50,000 troops to Belarus and western Russia by September, the document says. This would be followed by the movement of troops and medium-range missiles to the enclave of Kaliningrad, which lies between Poland and Lithuania.
title: German armed forces 'preparing for Nato conflict with Russia', leaked documents claim
